channel.title: How!@?
channel.description: ok i have my source and everything but i downloaded the moparscape client thing to use with my source and it worked the problem is i dont want the massive black thing at the bottom or it saying mopar scape at the top or the massive picture in the backround saying moparscape lol i was wondering does anyone know where i can get a client to use with my source???

item.title: How!@?
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

download one?

i suggest getting the blankscape client (it is a package so it has source and client) and adding sprites and models and stuff manually

Read full topic
